summary: It makes combats extremely challenging and deadly.
descriptionHtml:
[center]

[size=3][img]https://s17.postimg.io/3y2k9uqbz/coollogo_com_105381497.png[/img][/size]
[size=3]
[size=3]_________________________________________________________________________________________________[/size]

[size=4][color=#ffe599][/color][/size][color=#ffe599]
[/color][size=4][color=#ffe599][b]Improving your experience in combat
[/b][/color][/size]

[font=Verdana]This mod will make enemies extremely aggressive both in groups and individually. NPCs will be strategic and intelligent during combat and will always flanking the player.
[/font]
[size=3]________________________________________________________________________________________________

[/size]
[youtube]76Hc59AgNwc[/youtube]

[youtube]bg_X5yMri9I[/youtube]

[youtube]2Qu90WgCfC0[/youtube]

_________________________________________________________________________________________________________[/size]
[size=3][b][color=#ffe599][size=4]
Features [/size][/color][size=4]
[/size][/b][size=3]
- Increased difficulty in battles;
-The most common enemies can defeat you if you're not prepared;
- Enemies will always choose their best weapons to attack the player;
-Truly intense battles with smarter, more aggressive and strategic enemies;[size=3]
- NPCs try to flank the player more often;
- Enemy can attack with a sequence of blows;
- It is possible to see two or more enemies attacking the player at the same time;
- Enemies can combine their attacks to cause more damage to the player;
- Enemies will be extremely aggressive and ruthless, regardless of whether they are alone or in a group;
- No scripts;
- Enemies block most player attacks more efficiently;
-Enemies are more opportunistic and may flee if they are disadvantaged;
[/size][/size]
_____________________________________________________________________________________________________
[/size]

[font=Verdana][img]https://s18.postimg.io/6hca2rsm1/image.jpg[/img][/font]


[size=3]____________________________________________________________________________________________________[/size]

[color=#f1c232]
[font=Arial][size=3]COMPATIBILITY [/size][/font][/color][font=Arial]
[/font]


[size=3]I recommend putting this mod at the bottom of your load order. To avoid possible conflicts.[/size]
[size=3] [/size][size=3]

[size=3]____________________________________________________________________________________________________[/size][/size][/center]
author: Fillipe
